oai_dc:dc.dc:title: AT & T Building seen from Broadway, Nashville, Tennessee, 2017 April 20
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A view (pictured from Broadway Avenue) of the AT&T Building (333 Commerce Street, Nashville, Tennessee), a postmodern 33-story skyscraper completed in August 1994. It was formerly the South Central Bell Building and BellSouth Building. This office tower is informally known as the "Batman Building" and stands at approx.. 617 ft. (188.1 m). Also pictured: Regions Bank, One Nashville Place, 150 Fourth Avenue N; The Stage on Broadway, a live music venue located at 412 Broadway Avenue; and Bailey’s Pub & Grille, 408 Broadway. Forms part of the Leanne Garland Photograph Collection. 1 digital photograph.
